title: CiCi's Mile High, OBJ in LA, Happy Lies, Supreme Court Confirmation and more.
itunes:title: CiCi's Mile High, OBJ in LA, Happy Lies, Supreme Court Confirmation and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CLO NEVER fails to cut through it! CiCi and Russell Wilson are already making moves in their new city. Judge Brown Jackson continues to hold it together and Ted Cruz made Steve wish he was there. Gary, IN checked in gave Big Dog props in the VM. Someone in the NBA is retiring after 20 years and The LA Rams want to keep OBJ. This round of Would You Rather lets us know how the fellas really feel about bears and bees. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve explains the manufacturing process of fun.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
